abilities.name: Pollen Stench
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused; if tails, your Active Pokémon is now Confused. This power can't be used if Dark Gloom is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Poisonpowder
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
